title.narrative: Egypt
Creation of job/hiring of employees and growth of start-ups (in terms of revenue, users, subscribers etc.)

target.value: Creation of job/hiring of employees and growth of start-ups (in terms of revenue. users. subscribers etc.)

actual.value: 0.7 new employees per start-up. 68 % of start-ups experienced some kind of growth as a result of the program.

target.value: Creation of job/hiring of employees and growth of start-ups (in terms of revenue. users. subscribers etc.)

actual.value: 0.7 new employees per start-up. 68 % of start-ups experienced some kind of growth as a result of the program.

title.narrative: MENA
Enhanced leadership in partner business organisations

target.value: Leaders in DI's partner organisations are more capable of leading their organisations and pushing for more effective governance structures

actual.value: A course on leadership. management and governance structure was organised

target.value: Leaders in DI's partner organisations are more capable of leading their organisations and pushing for more effective governance structures

actual.value: A course on leadership. management and governance structure was organised

title.narrative: Jordan
Reinforcement of Jordan Chamber of Industry (JCI) as a legitimate and capable representative of Jordanian companies

target.value: 1. JCI has increased its legitimacy as voice ift the industry of Jordan; 2. Based on evidence and research. JCI has reinforced its efforts within promotion of sustainable energy usage and practices amongst its member states

actual.value: A guide was developed for Jordanian companies on how to utilise green energy sources and take actively part in the Green Transition. This was promoted by JCI at various workshops. conferences etc.

target.value: 1. JCI has increased its legitimacy as voice ift the industry of Jordan; 2. Based on evidence and research. JCI has reinforced its efforts within promotion of sustainable energy usage and practices amongst its member states

actual.value: A guide was developed for Jordanian companies on how to utilise green energy sources and take actively part in the Green Transition. This was promoted by JCI at various workshops. conferences etc.

title.narrative: Tunisia
Promoted social dialogue between UTICA and UGTT and enforced Public-Private Dialogue

target.value: Strengthened base for conducting social dialogue and Public-Private Dialogue: PPD conference executed

actual.value: 1. A benchmarking study on unemployment insurance was executed as a base for policy work; 2. The "9th PPD Workshop on Enterprise Development for Youth and Inclusion" was executed

target.value: Raised joint awareness of the Danish labour market model: Tunisian-Danish exchange on Danish labour market model

actual.value: A joint study trip to Denmark with participation from UTICA. UGTT. the Social Minister and parliament representatives was executed

title.narrative: MENA
MENA

target.value: The members has become inspired to work dedicated within green transition. both by experience sharing from FEI/ECO and from awareness raising of the actual potential for companies that choose to take part in the green transition

actual.value: AE meeting was held in Egypt in January 2017. focusing on green transition

target.value: The members has become inspired to work dedicated within green transition. both by experience sharing from FEI/ECO and from awareness raising of the actual potential for companies that choose to take part in the green transition

actual.value: AE-network participated in the grand sustainability summit in Abu Dhabi in January 2016

title.narrative: By improving the institutional and local awareness of working conditions understood as activties related to social responsibility and occupational health issues, you pave the way for a more stable labour market and thus a more productive industry, generat

FEI is first mover and has a very active role in promoting CSR and social dialogue (in an early phase related to OHS) in Egypt so as to improve local labour conditions and competitiveness and thereby create jobs and growth

target.value: More companies have adopted strategic CSR initiative as part of their core business. More companies have applied for the CSR award. FEI have undertaken several CSR assignments for member companies to improve working conditions. Social dialogue have become more formalized at enterprise level and OHS has become a guiding term for the dialogue.

actual.value: FEI have increased and further developed their CSR engagement and had over 500 companies apply for the CSR award. 200 enterprises attended as well as 12 media houses. It was broadcast on national television. So the notion of CSR has matured. More CSR assessments at enterprise level have taken place. OHS training and negotiator program has also been developed and executed at enterprise level by FEI. The social dialogue is improving at some enterprises but has not yet been a guiding principle.

title.narrative: Egypt
Egypt

target.value: More companies have adopted strategic CSR initiative as part of their core business

actual.value: Increase in CSR engagement by FEI

target.value: Social dialogue have become more formalised at enterprise level and OHS has become a guiding term for the dialogue

actual.value: OHS training and negotiator program developed and executed at enterprise level

title.narrative: By improving the institutional and local awareness of working conditions understood as activties related to social responsibility and occupational health issues, you pave the way for a more stable labour market and thus a more productive industry, generat
CSR promoting activities executed by FEI, including CSR services and CSR Award

target.value: FEI has organized and executed the 2nd CSR conference increasing CSR awareness and best practice sharing. 250 entreprises have filed for the award. FEI has extended and executed CSR services for member companies

actual.value: The CSR conference has been succesfully executed and more than 200 companies attended the conference and more than 500 companies applied for the award. Satisfaction among members using FEI and CSR services has increased and awareness in media. reports. brochures. workshops etc. on the CSR agenda has increased.

title.narrative: Morocco
Promoted social dialogue between CGEM and Moroccan labour unions

target.value: At least one joint seminar executed. At least two joint study/research developed.

actual.value: One international seminar was executed with best practices from four different countries on the transition towards formal economy. Three background studies were conducted by the labour unions and one study by the employers to qualify the seminar discussions

target.value: Strengthende social dialogue between CGEM and Moroccan labour unions.

actual.value: One joint national seminar was organised by the social partners and attended by public authorities
